amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $17,192,000,000, not to be derived from amounts of appropriations made available by title IX.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the total amount of appropriations made available by this Act by $17,192,000,000, not to be derived from amounts of appropriations made available by title IX.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 290 (Roll no. 517).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 290 (Roll no. 517).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
